(Whoops, Alloran, I see the post.  I must've read Sharpedge's reply before 
going to school yesterday but didnt' have time to reply to so I forgot)


The Oblitercons/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Demon 
Wulf/Sixshot/Ares/Serpentor/Unitron/Chaos/Minion/Ares:




Dark One yelled out as 34 rapid blasts sent him back a few feet, slamming to 
his back, letting out a loud yell.

---

Breakdown turned his head to Dark One.  "Slag!  You dirty Maximal-loving 
freaks!" ye yelled, transforming into his artillery mode.  "ASSIST DARK ONE!" 
he yelled loudly, firing off a two foot long shell that would explode on 
impact (artillery as in cannon, only cannon from 21st century) at Blender.

---

Pyro watched Dark One fall.  "Not very nice." he chuckled, firing off three 
fire balls at Blender.

---

Hiss fired off three blasts from his fusion cannon at Stronghold's left knee.

---

Scavenger fired off 25 explosive shells at Stronghold's abdomen.

---

Demon Wulf raised his sword to point at the Mafia base, not noticing the two 
missiles that blew apart on him, sending him flying to the left several feet, 
crashing to the ground hard.

---

Dark Claw saw his leader fall.  "My brother, I will avenge you.  Flesh 
Ripper, aid him, I must finish what I have started." Dark Claw's voice boomed 
from his attack vehicle mode.  Arming the launchers, he fired off two more 
missiles at the Mafia base.

---

Flesh Ripper raised his rifle, firing three blasts from it and 10 rapid optic 
blasts at Sharpedge.  "No one defies Demon Wulf."

---

Sixshot was now turned around, and saw Reptilica's battle.  Looked kind of 
sad.  Sixshot armed his missile launchers, firing off two missiles at 
Jetstorm.

---

Ares slowly transformed from his tank mode.  Getting up equally as slow.  
Taking a step hurt.  Moving at all hurt!  His body was badly burned, and 
there was a big gaping, leaking hole in his side.  "Sixshot," he said into 
his comm. unit, "I'm badly damaged and going back to the Alliance base for 
repairs." Ares ended the comlink, hobbling for the Alliance base.

---

Unitron saw the shields flicker and die.  "Victory..." he saw the Oblitercons 
attacking two robots.  "Fools, with their artillery we could end this!" he 
said.  He fired off three laser bolts from each rifle.  He knew six laser 
bolts striking into the side of the base wouldn't destroy it, but he had to 
do the most damage possible.

---

Chaos launched two missiles from his trailer mode at the Mafia base.  He 
transformed to robot mode, catching some autogun fire in his left leg.  
"Slag!  I'm out of missiles.  Stupid base." he said, taking out his laser 
rifle and looking around for a suitable victim.

---

Minion fired off five rapid optic blasts at the Mafia base.

---

Serpentor got up slowly.  Standing to his feet, the king cobra cursed.  His 
chest plate was smashed in, and edges of the damaged area were leaking a nice 
amount of mech-fluid.  

He picked up his plasma launcher, firing off its last shot at the Mafia base. 
 He tossed the energy-less weapon into subspace, retrieving a plasma rifle.
